item.title: GRPC Interface Style Guide
item.description: This provides a style guide for .proto files. By following these conventions, you’ll make your protocol buffer message definitions and their corresponding classes consistent and easy to read. Unless otherwise indicated, this style guide is based on the style guide from google protocol-buffers style under Apache 2.0 License & Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 License. Note that protocol buffer style can evolve over time, so it is likely that you will see .
